text: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Q1. How do I start the registration process? You can start the registration process by visiting the registration portal and clicking on Create New Account . Q2. What documents are required for registration? You need a valid photo ID, proof of address, and visa documents if you are an international applicant. Q3. How long does registration take? Standard registration takes 2–3 business days. International registrations may take up to 5 business days. Q4

. International registrations may take up to 5 business days. Q4. Can I update my details after submitting the form? Yes, you can log into your account and update your personal details at any time. Q5. What should I do if my registration is rejected? If your registration is rejected, you will receive an email explaining the reason. You can correct the issue and resubmit. Q6. I did not receive the verification email. What should I do? Please check your spam folder

. Q6. I did not receive the verification email. What should I do? Please check your spam folder. If you still cannot find it, contact support. Q7. Is my data secure? Yes, all personal information is encrypted and handled according to data protection regulations.

Registration Guide – User Onboarding System 1. Overview This guide explains the step-by-step process for registering as a new user in the system. Registration is mandatory to access all services and features. 2. Who Can Register The following users are eligible to register: ● Australian residents and citizens ● International students with valid visas ● Temporary workers with valid permits 3

. Required Documents To complete registration, you must provide: ● Valid government-issued photo ID (Passport or Driver’s License) ● Proof of address (utility bill or bank statement) ● Visa documentation (if applicable) 4. Registration Steps 1. Visit the registration portal 2. Click on Create New Account 3. Enter personal details (full name, email, phone number) 4. Upload required documents 5. Verify your email address 6

. Upload required documents 5. Verify your email address 6. Submit the registration form You will receive a confirmation email once registration is successful. 5. Processing Time ● Standard applications: 2–3 business days ● International applications: 3–5 business days 6. Common Issues ● Blurry document uploads may cause rejection ● Incorrect email address can delay verification ● Expired ID documents are not accepted 7
. Support For any issues during registration, contact the support team via: ● Email: support@company.com ● Phone: +61 2 1234 5678
